Luciana Sayuri Mizioka

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/1377730075677444
  • Última atualização do currículo em 09/09/2019

Luciana Sayuri Mizioka holds a bachelor´s degree in Control Engineering from Universidade de São Paulo (USP, 2001), Brazil, and a Master Degree in Aeronautical Engineering from Instituto Tecnológico de Aeronáutica (ITA, 2009), São José dos Campos, São Paulo, Brazil. She is currently pursuing her Doctor Degree in Eletronic Engineering from Instituto Tecnológico de Aeronáutica (ITA). She is with EMBRAER S.A., São José dos Campos, São Paulo, Brazil, since 2002. She works as a Development Engineer in an R&T group at EMBRAER performing research on IVHM technology for application to aeronautical systems. Her current research interests are the application of health monitoring techniques for industrial robots and the usage of PHM information for manufacturing process optimization, customer services process optimization and atrial electrogram multivariable analysis before and after PVI in human persistent atrial fibrillation. (Texto informado pelo autor)
